Title: All Yours
Writer: Brian Sawyer (story), Gregg Rossen (story), Brian Sawyer (teleplay), Gregg Rossen (teleplay), Ari Posner (teleplay)
Actors: Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne, Kiefer O'Reilly, Genea Charpentier
Plot: Cass, a widowed mother of two and driven attorney, is in need of a nanny. She hires Matt, a handsome single family friend. Matthew's more laid back style changes the demeanor of the family's intense schedule. Does Cass realize she's needs to adjust her life's focus?
